wiktionary_senses.definition: The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.
The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.
By analogy with a human brain, the part of a machine or computer that performs calculations.
A loose compartment of a backpack that straps on over the top opening.
To dash out the brains of; to kill by smashing the skull.
To destroy; to put an end to.
To conceive in the mind; to understand.
